description:
HOW DO I MEET "MR. RIGHT?"

As a professional matchmaker and dating expert, this is a question I often receive from professional women each and every week. How to meet the right guy may appear to be difficult, but what if you knew the secret? What if you understood what men were looking for and how to attract the right guy for you?

In my 6-week video course, you will learn the secrets to my success and how to apply it to your life. As a professional matchmaker who regularly works with singles, knowing the who, what, where, when and howâ€™s of dating is what keeps me going.

In this course, you will learn:

  • Who these men are
  • What to wear
  • Where to meet with them
  • When to meet them
  • How to approach them

Each section will cover all the areas of my popular How to Meet Men live workshop, and the best thing about it is, you can study at your own pace!

PLEASE NOTE: This is an interactive course where you will be required to do PHYSICAL outdoor activities in order to fully benefit from this program. As per my welcome video, you may be asked to try a new restaurant or introduce yourself to a new person.

This is more than just a standard "HOW-TO" course. This is about putting your faith (in meeting the right one) into action!

Want this course with one-on-one coaching by Jasmine? This course is also available WITH coaching at LovebyJD.com/group-coaching/htmm. Pricing will vary.
title: How to Meet Single Professional Men
